name: Archivium
description: AI Applications The essential user-facing and acquisition interfaces. Models The core intelligence driving AI operations. Knowledge Bases / Data Sets The foundational lifeblood of the AI revolution. The Archivium Protocol is the decentralized infrastructure layer that empowers AI models, applications, and data owners to securely transact and monetize their assets in Web3. A single AI query necessitates complex interactions between applications, models, and knowledge bases. Archivium simplifies this process, enabling AI value creators to rapidly deploy and monetize their contributions. The AI Marketplace for All The Archivium AI Hub serves as your gateway to the new AI economy, removing technical barriers to entry. It offers everything from AI applications and tutorials to comprehensive reward programs. More than a platform, it is a distribution engine for the next generation of AI products.
